page.title: 18THE MOBILE LIBRARY.
page.content: {Launceston mobile library }makes the following fortnightly stops in the Werrington area:Route 3,Crossgate Farm 9.15-9.25am.Wednesday,three families. Werrington Vicarage,9.35-9.50am.two families. Route 7,Ladycross Chapel 4.05-4.15pm.Tuesday, two families. {The Tavistock mobile library}stops at Peters Finger Garage fortnightly on Thursday at 11.55-12.05pm.two families and Box's Shop 12.10-12.45pm. twenty families.The total bookstock of the Launceston van is approx.9,635,of these 2,500 are on the vehicle.Those borrowed include light romance,serious fiction,cookery,stamp-collecting and childrens books.Large print,for poor- sighted are also carried.Readers may also order a record from a catalogue which will then be delivered via the van. This service costs 38p.Books may be ordered at a cost of 20p.
